clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for contract termination.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.

clauses.title: Data Protection
clauses.summary: GDPR compliance required for all data processing.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs, creating potential exposure.
Contract auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry.
Standard termination clause provides adequate notice period.

evidence.snippet: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees paid under this agreement.
Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice.
Data breach liability excluded from general liability cap.

clauses.title: Service Level Agreement
clauses.summary: 99.9% uptime guarantee with penalties for non-compliance.

clauses.title: Price Escalation
clauses.summary: Annual price increases capped at 5% per year.

clauses.title: Early Termination
clauses.summary: Early termination fee equals 50% of remaining contract value.

insights.message: Early termination penalties are excessive and may limit flexibility.
SLA penalties insufficient to cover business impact of downtime.
Price escalation clause allows significant cost increases over time.

evidence.snippet: Service availability shall be maintained at 99.9% measured monthly.
Early termination fee shall equal 50% of fees for remaining term.
Annual price adjustments not to exceed 5% of previous year rates.
